title: PERSON OF INTEREST - Soundtrack Guide I (Ramin Djawadi's Themes)
author: FringeMusic107
comment: Person Of Interest definitely has the best soundtrack ever!!!!!! 😃

This is amazing, thank you so much. I love stuff like this that gets specific. I've watched this series like 4 times. 
Also I didn't' realize Alistair Wesley had his own theme.
I think I'll wait until at least a few episodes of season 3 have aired. That way I can (hopefully) include a few more new themes. I'm glad you're enjoying this one so much!
I love Person of Interest so much <3
Thanks for this - enhances an already great show! Looking forward to the follow-up.
description:
[please read]
Handy guide to all the various music themes from Person Of Interest. The score is composed by Ramin Djawadi. Finch's and Carter's themes are connected to the main "Machine theme". I might make a part 2 later to include the themes for Leon, Shaw, HR, Kara Stanton and more!
